remarks: The FOL content of ~ vtoclg1f (hence not using ~ ax-ext , ~ df-cleq , ~ df-nfc , ~ df-v ).  Note the weakened "major" hypothesis and the dv condition between ` x ` and ` A ` (needed since the class-form non-free predicate is not available without ~ ax-ext ; as a byproduct, this dispenses with ~ ax-11 and ~ ax-13 ).  (Contributed by BJ, 30-Apr-2019.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-vtoclg1f1.nf $e |- F/ x ps $.
bj-vtoclg1f1.maj $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph -> ps ) ) $.
bj-vtoclg1f1.min $e |- ph $.
bj-vtoclg1f1 $p |- ( E. y y = A -> ps ) $.
$d A x $.
$d A y $.
